description: You are able to record and recall even the complex and intricate details of spellcasting.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Spellcraft 5 ranks, keen recollection class feature.

sections.text: Once per day, you can record the formula for a spell that you saw being cast and identified with Spellcraft in the past 24 hours. This spell must be on the alchemist formula list.
sections.name: Benefits

name: Formula Recollection
